name: Maaind
slogan: Highly personalized real-time mental state feedback tech+app
description:
We're building a fundamentally new approach to AI, combining explainable AI (XAI) techniques, sensors - and in particular Brain Computer Interfaces (BCIs), to build highly personalized and trustable/explainable models of individual mental states. We call this tech bio-XLP. Our product, now in development, is an app that uses this to give users real-time feedback on their mental state - real-time neurofeedback. Users do not need to have wearables/sensors/BCI for the tech to work - we use BCIs and wearables during the training phase of models and where available from the hardcore QS people who do use existing BCIs or other wearables.

In the longer-term, the goal (obsession) is to build up the software+algorithmic infrastructure for enabling real-world Brain Computer Interface usecases - it's not enough to build the hardware, as some people are. We need the software and models to go along with interfacing to the human body and brain. This is what we are building at Maaind.

team.title: COO and Founder
team.name: Dzera Kaytati
team.bioHtml: COO/Co-Founder @Maaind. Working at the intersection of Neuroscience and Human-centered AI

team.title: CEO and Founder
team.name: Dr. Martin Dinov
team.bioHtml: CEO&Founder @Maaind - neurotech and AI startup building the next evolution of AI-mind assistant Previously co-founder @HackTheSenses

jobs.title: Machine Learning Engineer
jobs.description:
We are now hiring at Maaind for our first machine learning engineer. Come join us if you want to help augment the human mind today - and help shape the present and future of mental wellbeing and mental performance, through voice analytics, biometrics and brain computer interfaces.

We are getting ready to launch the world's first AI assistant for mental state feedback, Aurora (https://www.aurora.maaind.com). Aurora provides real-time, historical and detailed insights into different aspects of an individual's mental state from voice, wearables and brain computer interfaces. 

We want to empower individuals and improve selfawareness and the ability of individuals to improve their mentalstates. Data, algorithms and devices should not just help to sell us more things, distract us and entertain us - but make us kinder, healthier, happier and more focused. 

You will work with cutting edge multimodal datasets, state-of-the-art algorithms and the latest wearables (including BCI devices) to help build better ML models and pipelines.

We are now growing our team and you will be helping to shape the early days of the company. You will be part of a sharp-as-a-knife team, and ready to go from week 1.

Talk to me if you want a challenge. It's going to be tough. Be a hustler.
